statements: SELECT * FROM auditing_configurations;
SELECT id, configuration_name, database_name FROM auditing_configurations;
SELECT schema_name, security_measure FROM auditing_configurations WHERE financial_data_protection = 'high';
SELECT * FROM auditing_configurations WHERE configuration_name LIKE '%audit%';
SELECT database_name, configuration_name, security_measure FROM auditing_configurations ORDER BY database_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM auditing_configurations WHERE database_name = 'Production' AND financial_data_protection = 'Enabled';
SELECT configuration_name, database_name, security_measure FROM auditing_configurations WHERE schema_name = 'Public';
SELECT id, configuration_name, database_name, security_measure FROM auditing_configurations ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM auditing_configurations WHERE financial_data_protection = 'Disabled' OR security_measure = 'High';
SELECT DISTINCT configuration_name, schema_name FROM auditing_configurations WHERE financial_data_protection = 'Enabled';
SELECT * FROM Financial_Configurations;
SELECT id, database_name, configuration_type FROM Financial_Configurations WHERE required_security_level='HIGH';
SELECT * FROM Security_Logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_performed, timestamp FROM Security_Logs WHERE success=true;
SELECT id, database_name, audit_date FROM Financial_Configurations WHERE configuration_type='Database';
SELECT database_name, configuration_type, required_security_level FROM Financial_Configurations WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Financial_Configurations WHERE configuration_type = 'Encryption';
SELECT user_id, action_performed, timestamp FROM Security_Logs WHERE success = true ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Financial_Configurations WHERE audit_date > '2022-01-01' AND required_security_level = 'High' ORDER BY audit_date ASC;
SELECT id, database_name, configuration_type, required_security_level, audit_date FROM Financial_Configurations WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT configuration_name, configuration_value FROM Auditing_SQL_database_configurations;
SELECT * FROM Security_Measures ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, data_classification FROM Financial_Data WHERE data_classification='Confidential';
SELECT measure_name, measure_description FROM Security_Measures WHERE security_id=1;
SELECT * FROM Auditing_SQL_database_configurations WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Auditing_SQL_database_configurations;
SELECT configuration_name, configuration_value FROM Auditing_SQL_database_configurations ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT measure_name, measure_description FROM Security_Measures WHERE implementation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, financial_record FROM Financial_Data WHERE data_classification = 'Confidential';
SELECT configuration_name, configuration_value FROM Auditing_SQL_database_configurations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY balance DESC, account_number ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT owner_name, balance FROM financial_data WHERE balance > 10000
SELECT * FROM security_measures
SELECT account_number, owner_name FROM financial_data WHERE owner_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT id, timestamp, action FROM security_audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM auditing_configs WHERE database_name = 'production';
SELECT id, schema_name, configuration FROM auditing_configs ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_number, owner_name FROM financial_data WHERE owner_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT measure_name, description FROM security_measures WHERE LENGTH(description) > 50 ORDER BY measure_name;
SELECT * FROM table_1 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT database_name, configuration FROM table_2 WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT database_name, responsible_person FROM table_5 WHERE responsible_person LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT * FROM table_3 WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, database_name, impact_rating FROM table_4 ORDER BY impact_rating DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM table_1 WHERE id = 1;
SELECT database_name, configuration FROM table_2 WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY database_name ASC;
SELECT last_updated, id FROM table_3 WHERE database_name LIKE '%test%' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT id, database_name, impact_rating FROM table_4 WHERE impact_rating > 5 AND database_name = 'production';
SELECT responsible_person FROM table_5 WHERE responsible_person IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
